#include<stdio.h>

int num,base=-2,digits[10000],k,rem,c;

int main()
{
    scanf("%d",&num);
    do
    {
    k=0;
    if(num==0){printf("0\n");return 0;}    
    while(num)
    {
        c=num/base;
        rem=num-base*c;
        num=num/base;
        //printf("%d\n",num);
        if(rem<0)
        {
           num+=1;
           rem+=base*(-1);
        }
        digits[k]=rem;
        k++;        
    }    
    k--;
    while(k>=0)
    {
       printf("%c",(digits[k]<=9?digits[k]+48:digits[k]+55));
       k--;
    }
    printf("\n");
    scanf("%d",&num);
    }while(num!=0);
  
    return 0;
}
